TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 為 Dynamic Data 資料表提供者 (Provider) 提供基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides the base class for Dynamic Data table providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料表提供者必須擴充此類別。Table providers must extend this class. LINQ to SQL 類別和 ADO.NET 實體資料模型會擴充此類別的提供者。LINQ to SQL classes and the ADO.NET Entity data model are providers that extend this class.
